message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's in excellent condition and I know you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your position, I can't go as low as $12,000. How about we split the difference and I sell it to you for $12,500? This is a fair price considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and I'm still not able to meet you at $12,500. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000 if possible. Thank you for understanding.
